reviews.review: Love this game, simple yet thousands of hours of entertainment!
hey, dette spil er godt at spille man kan bruge meget tid på det og man kan købe mange fede skins
too many cheaters and fishy people
After 1 Month of playing this game, i had to move to Russia because i couldnt speak my Motherlanguage anymore.

Leave game for 1 year.
Return. 
Play Everyday. 
Say I Will Not Buy A Knife. 
Buy A Knife. 
Stop Playing Game. 
Sell Knife. 
Repeat.
Muito bom, eu recomendo, alem de divertido é possível ganhar skins para ter um lucro.
One of the best games i ever played.

This game is awesome. There are a lot of great and friendly players and in this game you don't have to wait so long to get into a match. I highly recommend  this game for everyone, it's free to play what makes it even better.

Говнище редкосное не рекомендую в нее играть или скачивать

Best FPS ever made for competitive gamers. However, I can't recommend this game to anyone, as since going free-to-play, the matchmaking has become a cheaters paradise. You will not enjoy playing against cheats. If you want to play solo queue, buy Faceit premium. If you want to play with friends, find a different game.
